Game Tips - In 'My PUZZLE', your goal is to arrange the tiles numbered from 1 to 8 in the correct order.
You can slide the tiles to the right, left, top, or bottom to merge them. The gameplay is easy, but it's great for improving your reflexes and strategic thinking!

Main Features:
- The game has a simple and user-friendly interface.
- The tiles must be arranged in order from 1 to 8.
- Test your time during gameplay;

Designed for puzzle enthusiasts who appreciate quick, engaging, and thought-provoking puzzle games. Give this project a try and become a guide for spending relaxing time! Get the 'My PUZZLE' game now for an exciting time-passing experience! Start evaluating the game and share your results with your friends. Have fun finding the correct positions!
